metadata.synopsis: If the players do anything "wrong" in the Archive, Korrilla tries to leave
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. teleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_Pedestal_Treasure013. Steal the treasure

0.speaker: Korrilla
0.text: He's not going to like that. And he's not going to find me standing next to you.
